activities: K12 is a technology-based education company. K12 offers proprietary curriculum, software systems and educational services designed to facilitate individualized learning for students primarily in kindergarten through 12th grade, or K-12.  During the course of, or in order to provide its services, K12 may receive personal data about prospective, current, or former customers or employees who are residents of the EU, Switzerland or the EEA.  Generally, any personal data collected, processed, used, and transferred is subject to K12’s Website Privacy Policy and its Customer and Employee Safe Harbor Policy.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President, General Counsel, and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, Customer and Human Resources Data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for organization human resources data; Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services (JAMS) for all other data.
